statements: SELECT * FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords;
SELECT vehicle_id, service_cost, service_date FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, service_cost FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords WHERE service_cost > 1000;
SELECT MAX(service_cost) AS highest_cost FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords;
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords WHERE service_cost > 1000 ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, service_date FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords WHERE service_cost < 5000 ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(service_cost) AS average_cost FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords WHERE service_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, SUM(service_cost) AS total_cost FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING total_cost > 5000;
SELECT service_date, MAX(service_cost) AS max_cost FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords GROUP BY service_date ORDER BY max_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records;
SELECT vehicle_id, service_cost, service_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_records;
SELECT service_date, service_cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records ORDER BY service_cost DESC;
SELECT model_name FROM vehicle_models;
SELECT model_name, model_id FROM vehicle_models ORDER BY model_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE service_cost > 1000 ORDER BY service_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_id, service_date, service_cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id IN (SELECT model_id FROM vehicle_models WHERE model_name = 'SUV');

SELECT model_name, service_cost FROM vehicle_models JOIN vehicle_maintenance_records ON vehicle_models.model_id = vehicle_maintenance_records.vehicle_id WHERE service_cost BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY model_name, service_cost;
SELECT vehicle_id, service_date, service_cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE service_date >= '2022-01-01' AND service_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY service_date, service_cost DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT model_name, COUNT(*) AS total_services FROM vehicle_models JOIN vehicle_maintenance_records ON vehicle_models.model_id = vehicle_maintenance_records.vehicle_id GROUP BY model_name HAVING total_services > 5 ORDER BY total_services DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records ORDER BY service_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT vehicle_id, service_cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE service_cost > 100 ORDER BY service_cost ASC
SELECT service_date, service_cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE service_cost < 50
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id = 3
SELECT vehicle_id, service_date, service_cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records
SELECT vehicle_id, service_date, service_cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE service_cost > 500 ORDER BY service_date DESC
SELECT service_date, vehicle_id, service_cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE service_cost BETWEEN 200 AND 800 ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE service_date >= '2022-01-01' AND service_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY service_cost DESC, vehicle_id ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, service_cost, service_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE service_date < CURDATE() ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC, service_cost ASC
SELECT service_date, vehicle_id, service_cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY service_date ASC
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_year > 2010;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_make, vehicle_model, vehicle_year FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT maintenance_id, service_date, service_cost FROM maintenance_records WHERE service_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_year DESC;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, vehicle_year FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
SELECT vehicle_make, COUNT(vehicle_make) AS total_count FROM vehicles GROUP BY vehicle_make ORDER BY total_count DESC;

SELECT maintenance_id, vehicles.vehicle_make, maintenance_records.service_date FROM maintenance_records JOIN vehicles ON maintenance_records.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id WHERE maintenance_records.service_cost > 1000 ORDER BY maintenance_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT record_id, service_date, cost FROM maintenance_record WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT name, location FROM service_center ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT technician_id, name FROM technician WHERE technician_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2010
SELECT name, location FROM service_center ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, COUNT(assignment_id) AS assignments_count FROM service_center_assignment GROUP BY name
SELECT technician_id, name FROM technician WHERE name LIKE '%John%'

SELECT v.make, v.model, r.cost, s.name FROM vehicle v INNER JOIN maintenance_record r ON v.vehicle_id = r.vehicle_id INNER JOIN service_center_assignment a ON r.record_id = a.record_id INNER JOIN service_center s ON a.center_id = s.center_id ORDER BY r.cost DESC
